page.title: 05HANLEY POLICE STATION
page.content: Police help to preserve life and to prevent and detect crime.Hanley Police station is the Divisional Headquarters for Stoke-on-Trent North Division and the officer in charge is a Chief Superintendent.There are various departments within - uniform,crime prevention,horses and the C.I.D. The crime prevention helps to stop crime before it is committed by going round to factories,shops,houses,and offices explaining how to prevent crime.The police explain where best to keep belongings and money. Many of the townspeople are thankful for this service for if it wasn't for this dept, many people would have had a lot of their property stolen or damaged.If arson has occurred the police work closely with the Fire Brigade who are situated near to the police station in Bethesda Street.
